sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(NTT_ID),0)+1 AS NTT_ID FROM $tableNm$
INSERT INTO $tableNm$ (NTT_ID, BBS_ID, NTT_SJ, NTT_CN, SORT_ORDR, NTCR_ID, NTCR_NM, PASSWORD, INQIRE_CO, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, REPLY_AT, PARNTS, NTT_NO, REPLY_LC, ATCH_FILE_ID, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, USE_AT, SECRET_AT, DELETE_CODE, NTT_TYPE, BBS_SE, HTML_AT, DEPT_ID ) VALUES ( #nttId#, #bbsId#, #nttSj#, #nttCn:CLOB#, #sortOrdr#, #ntcrId#, #ntcrNm#, #password#, 0, #ntceBgnde#, #ntceEndde#, #replyAt#,
#nttId#,
#parnts#,
#nttNo#, #replyLc#, #atchFileId#, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATE, 'Y', #secret#, #delcode#, #nttType#, #gubun#, #htmlYn#, #deptId# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, a.FILE_SN, a.FILE_STRE_COURS, a.STRE_FILE_NM, a.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, a.FILE_EXTSN, a.FILE_MG, a.FILE_CN, a.FILE_FIELD_NM AS FILE_FIELD_NAME, b.NTT_ID, b.BBS_ID FROM TC_COMMNFILE_DETAIL a INNER JOIN $tableNm$ b ON b.ATCH_FILE_ID = a.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1
a.ATCH_FILE_ID IN
#atchFileIdData[]#
order by a.FILE_SN desc

/* BasicBBSManageDAO.selectBoardArticleList */
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
SELECT a.NTT_ID , a.NTT_SJ , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , a.NTCR_NM , a.NTT_NO , a.INQIRE_CO , a.PARNTS , a.REPLY_AT , a.REPLY_LC , a.USE_AT , a.ATCH_FILE_ID , a.BBS_ID , a.NTCE_BGNDE , a.NTCE_ENDDE , a.SECRET_AT SECRET , a.NTT_TYPE AS nttType2 , case when NTT_TYPE = '1' AND REPLACE(a.NTCE_BGNDE,'-','') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND REPLACE(a.NTCE_ENDDE,'-','') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') then '1' else '2' END AS ntt_type ,TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as regDate ,a.BBS_SE GUBUN ,a.HTML_AT HTML_YN ,a.DELETE_CODE DELCODE ,a.DEPT_ID FROM $tableNm$ a WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId#
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
ORDER BY a.PARNTS desc, a.REPLY_LC ASC
ORDER BY a.NTT_TYPE ASC, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
ORDER BY a.PARNTS desc, a.REPLY_LC ASC
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT a.NTT_ID , a.NTT_SJ , a.NTT_CN , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , a.NTCR_NM , a.NTT_NO , a.INQIRE_CO , a.PARNTS , a.REPLY_AT , a.REPLY_LC , a.USE_AT , a.ATCH_FILE_ID , a.BBS_ID , a.NTCE_BGNDE , a.NTCE_ENDDE , a.SECRET_AT SECRET , a.NTT_TYPE AS NTT_TYPE2 , case when NTT_TYPE = '1' AND REPLACE(a.NTCE_BGNDE,'-','') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND REPLACE(a.NTCE_ENDDE,'-','') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') then '1' else '2' END AS NTT_TYPE ,TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as reg_date , a.BBS_SE GUBUN , a.HTML_AT HTML_YN , a.DELETE_CODE DELCODE , a.DEPT_ID FROM $tableNm$ a WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND a.DELETE_CODE = '0'
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
ORDER BY a.NTT_TYPE ASC, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
ORDER BY a.PARNTS desc, a.REPLY_LC ASC

SELECT a.NTT_ID , a.NTT_SJ , a.NTT_CN , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , a.NTCR_NM , a.NTT_NO , a.INQIRE_CO , a.PARNTS , a.REPLY_AT , a.REPLY_LC , a.USE_AT , a.ATCH_FILE_ID , a.BBS_ID , a.NTCE_BGNDE , a.NTCE_ENDDE , a.SECRET_AT SECRET , a.NTT_TYPE AS ntt_type2 , case when NTT_TYPE = '1' AND REPLACE(a.NTCE_BGNDE,'-','') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND REPLACE(a.NTCE_ENDDE,'-','') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') then '1' else '2' END AS ntt_type ,TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as reg_date , a.BBS_SE GUBUN , a.HTML_AT HTML_YN , a.DELETE_CODE as del_code , a.DEPT_ID FROM $tableNm$ a WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId#
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
SELECT COUNT(a.NTT_ID) FROM $tableNm$ a WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId#

SELECT a.NTT_SJ , a.NTCR_ID , a.NTCR_NM , a.NTT_NO , a.NTT_CN , a.PASSWORD , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , a.NTCE_BGNDE , a.NTCE_ENDDE , a.INQIRE_CO , a.USE_AT , a.ATCH_FILE_ID , a.BBS_ID , a.NTT_ID , a.PARNTS , a.REPLY_AT , a.SECRET_AT SECRET , a.NTT_TYPE , a.BBS_SE GUBUN , a.HTML_AT HTML_YN , a.DELETE_CODE DELCODE ,case when a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM >= SYSDATE-1 then 'Y' else 'N' END AS new_yn ,TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM ,a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as reg_date , a.DEPT_ID FROM $tableNm$ a WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND a.NTT_ID = #nttId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE $tableNm$ SET NTT_SJ = #nttSj#, NTT_CN = #nttCn:CLOB#, NTCR_ID = #ntcrId#, NTCR_NM = #ntcrNm#, PASSWORD = #password#, NTCE_BGNDE = #ntceBgnde#, NTCE_ENDDE = #ntceEndde#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#, SECRET_AT = #secret#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, NTT_TYPE = #nttType#, BBS_SE = #gubun#, HTML_AT = #htmlYn#, DEPT_ID = #deptId# WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND NTT_ID = #nttId#
UPDATE $tableNm$ SET USE_AT = 'N', LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, DELETE_CODE = #delcode# WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND NTT_ID = #nttId#
UPDATE $tableNm$ SET USE_AT = 'Y', LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, DELETE_CODE = #delcode# WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND NTT_ID = #nttId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(INQIRE_CO),0)+1 AS INQIRE_CO FROM $tableNm$ WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND NTT_ID = #nttId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE $tableNm$ SET INQIRE_CO = INQIRE_CO+1, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND NTT_ID = #nttId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NTT_NO FROM $tableNm$ WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND NTT_ID = #parnts#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $tableNm$ a WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND a.DELETE_CODE = '0' AND a.PARNTS = #nttId#

SELECT a.NTT_ID , a.NTT_SJ , a.NTT_CN , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , a.NTCR_NM , a.NTT_NO , a.INQIRE_CO , a.PARNTS , a.REPLY_AT , a.REPLY_LC , a.USE_AT , a.ATCH_FILE_ID , a.BBS_ID , a.SECRET_AT SECRET , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as reg_date ,TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , a.DEPT_ID FROM $tableNm$ a WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND a.DELETE_CODE = '0' AND a.PARNTS = #nttId# ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $tableNm$ WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND NTT_ID = #nttId# AND SECRET_AT = 'Y' AND PASSWORD = #password#
SELECT NTT_ID, NTT_SJ FROM TB_BBS_BASIC WHERE BBS_ID = 'B0000010' ORDER BY SORT_ORDR
